creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
signed: on bottom front of gold platform, in red and black beads:  CONS / TANT
text: Seven individuals gather around a drum. One plays maracas, another strums a guitar while another plays a harmonica. Smoke, color, and patterns swirl as a man extends an arm to a woman who steps forward clasping her hat. The work is framed by colorful patterns and beadwork.
title: Bal Kontredans
